question: Q.8207? has there been any update? I contacted Guidance Financial for Islamic financing with the impression that it was Halaal...
answer:
QUESTION
This question is related to question 8207. I contacted Guidance Financial for Islamic financing with the impression that it was Halaal. Ahmed Attia was the person to whom I spoke and after checking my credit history he came back to me with the pre-approval for the Finance. Later inorder to double check to make sure if the process was Hallal, I ran a search in Ask-imam.com and found your answer for question 8207. I would like to know the questionnaire you prepared and emailed to Guidance financial for their process clarification. That would definately help me and also if I can ask the same questionnaire to Ahmed Attia as he is in touch with me.
ANSWER


Share:
Todate, I have not received any correspondence from the company despite their assurance that they will reply to my queries.

Mr Ahmad Attia is aware of our questionnaire. Kindly ask him why he has not replied to our correspondence. We have been waiting for over a year.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Ml. Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
